About Me


Bio

I am a computer science student at Clemson University searching for a full time software engineering job after graduation.

Sonoco Products Company - 2018

SharePoint Administrator

Created and implemented a new SharePoint hub for the Sonoco Safety Division including 20 linked websites for each Sonoco plant. Flew to several Sonoco plants to understand the needs of Safety Coordinators at each location.

Sonoco Products Company - 2017

Information Technology

Worked closely with a team to provide employees with a variety of services including: Transferring data and installing programs, providing customer support, and repairing broken computers.

Coker College - 2015

Information Technology

Upgraded classrooms, conference rooms, and residence halls with current technology such as new computers, remote access points, and convenient power stations.
